description.content:
Are you planning to create business website, WordPress landing page, or website design for your product, event, blog, or startup business?


Don't Worry!


With my expertise in website development, I specialize in transforming your concepts into live WordPress website with a fresh look. Whether you need a SaaS landing page design, a redesign WordPress, or Figma to WordPress conversion, I've got you covered.


My Services Include:


  • Create and build WordPress Web-ite landing page designs
  • Designing SaaS Elementor landing page and creating stunning site landing pages
  • One-page redesign WordPress web-sIte with seamless migration
  • Responsive website design and development
  • Optimized image sliders and CTAs for high-conversion rates
  • Enhancing portfolio showcases, pop-ups, social media integration, Google Maps, and more
  • Plugin and theme installation, configuration, and customized functionality


What Sets Me Apart:


  • Delivering top-notch services for a seamless user experience
  • Ensuring smooth responsiveness on any device
  • FREE genuine Elementor Pro license (Worth $60)
  • 24/7 support


Please check the FAQ for more details.


Message me Now, and well create a custom order tailored just for you!

slide.name: do business website development, design, redesign wordpress website
do business website development, design, redesign wordpress website
do business website development, design, redesign wordpress website

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am ready to make the purchase! What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please send your domain and hosting login credentials (If you do not have them, I can assist you) I will need your logo, Figma, or any hand sketch, a brief description of your website or company's goal, the exact content (text, images, and videos) that you would like to be featured on your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if my requirements don't match any of your packages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries! Simply contact me, and we can discuss your requirements to create a customized package or determine the appropriate cost.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What will be the workflow of the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To start building your business website, we need to gather requirements and understand your objectives. We will send the initial draft to you before the final delivery to ensure we are aligned. We can schedule Zoom sessions with Fiverr to exchange suggestions and ideas or any adjustments needed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide content or text for the web pages?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I can only upload content that you provide, like text or photos. I don't provide create, summarize, or rewrite content services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will my site be SEO-optimized and responsive for all devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our team will optimize your website SEO with the Yoast plugin. However, for advanced SEO, we recommend consulting a freelancer with SEO expertise. Additionally, all designs will be responsive for desktop, laptop, and mobile devices.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need coding knowledge to manage my WordPress site?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No! One of the key benefits of my services is empowering you to take control of your website. I will provide you with comprehensive resources and materials that will simplify basic tasks, ensuring you won't need to hire someone every time you want to make changes or upload products to your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer hosting and domain services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not provide any hosting or domain services. However, I can provide recommendations and advise you on the best hosting/domain options to consider for your website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are those packages the final prices for your gig?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Generally, the cost of your website will be based on your specific needs. The website packages serve as base prices for different site types. Feel free to message me with your website requirements, and I'll provide a final quotation tailored to your needs.

reviews.comment: Ultimately the job was completed. I didn‚Äôt receive any links to the website to edit later on. Eye for detail is not the best.

seller_response.comment:
Thank you for your comments.

I recently took on an order to design a website, converting a Figma design into WordPress.

I completed all the requirements and shared the design with the client for review. After receiving their feedback, I implemented the requested changes promptly. Once everything was finalized, the client requested editing permissions to update the website content.

Following this, I delivered the project by completing all tasks and migrating the website to the client's domain and hosting. Even after the migration, the client provided additional changes, which I addressed accordingly.

It seems the client may not have reviewed the website thoroughly or missed my earlier message where I provided the website link. This could explain why they mentioned not receiving the link.
https://prnt.sc/NGKMTehYX2vS

Nonetheless, I truly value the opportunity to work with this client and am happy to have contributed to their project.

Thank you so much!

reviews.comment: Omar and team are beyond fantastic. I‚Äôve had a vision of what the website should looking like from the start and they‚Äôve essentially brought that vision and dream to life. I‚Äôm beyond thrilled with their work and amazing communication. It felt like working with a partner who‚Äôs willing to help me with my goals and I‚Äôm grateful for the support and great work. To those who are looking for the same type of support, I believe you should use them as the team is very supportive and will certainly bring your website to life.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for sharing your thoughts. It was a pleasure to work with you!

reviews.comment: Working with Md. Omar Faruk was a fantastic experience! Communication was smooth, and every detail was carefully handled. My vacation rental website now looks modern, professional, and much more inviting to visitors. The layout is clean, the images are beautifully placed, and the content is well-organized. Everything was delivered on time, and I was kept updated throughout the process. I also appreciate how easy it is to update the site in the future. Highly recommend this seller for anyone looking to improve their website!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for sharing your thoughts. It was a pleasure to work with you!

reviews.comment: I had to go though 2 other developers before I FOUND THE RIGHT PERSON FOR THE JOB!! I have no regrets, complaints, or anything. I am honestly impressed and I couldn't have asked for anyone better. For everyone planning to hire this team, please make sure you tip. They work very hard and pay very close attention to detail.

seller_response.comment:
Wow! üòä Thank you so much for your incredible feedback! It truly means the world to us. üíô We're so glad we could exceed your expectations and deliver exactly what you needed. Your appreciation and support keep us motivated to give our best on every project. üí™‚ú®
